name: Singer Heavy Duty Sewing Machine

images.alt_text: A photo of a black heavy-duty sewing machine

description:
We have a SINGER Heavy Duty 4432 sewing machine! 

Specs:
* Reverse stitching
* High-speed stitching (1100 stitches/minute!)
* Extra High Presser Foot Lifter for thick fabrics
* One-step buttonhole
* Motor is 60% stronger than a standard sewing machine motor
* A number of different stitches, with adjustable stitch length
